task.title: Creating a Filter in Gmail
task.shortdesc: Create mail filters based on characteristics of emails that you regularly receive.

taskbody.prereq: Change your security settings to allow automated processing of incoming mail.

context.p: Gmail enables you to create a filter based on characteristics of emails already in your inbox. This topic covers how to select template emails for the filter and then apply filter settings.

step.cmd: In the search box at the top, click the Search Options icon.

info.note: If you want to check that your search worked correctly, see what emails show up by clicking Search.

step.cmd: At the bottom of the search window, click Create filter.

result.p: When you create a filter to forward messages, only new messages will be affected. Additionally, when someone replies to a message you've filtered, the reply will only be filtered if it meets the same search criteria.
